definition[0]: a formal written statement describing someone’s character and abilities
definition[1]: something that is given or done to someone to thank or praise them, or show admiration for them
example[0]: a testimonial dinner in honour of Senator Frank Flint
definition[2]: a statement about the quality or value of a product, especially one made by a respected or famous person as part of an advertisement
example[1]: The ads feature testimonials from car owners who credit the air bag with saving their lives.
definition[3]: a formal written statement describing someone’s character and abilities that they can use when looking for work
example[2]: You may need a testimonial from a senior manager or employer.
